name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Amazon Connect Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **AWS Services**, specifically **Amazon Connect**, **DynamoDB**, **Lambda**, **CloudFormation**, **Terraform**, **Step Functions**, **S3**, **Kinesis**, and **API Gateway** to design and implement high-performance solutions. Proficient in **CI/CD** practices and Infrastructure as Code (IaC), I ensure operational excellence and seamless deployment of applications. My technical expertise in **Python** and **JavaScript** complements my robust problem-solving capabilities, enabling me to troubleshoot issues efficiently and deliver reliable systems aligned with best practices.

Beyond my technical acumen, I possess strong skills in **collaboration**, **communication**, and **stakeholder management**, ensuring that all project needs are met and objectives are achieved. My flexibility and influencing skills allow me to adapt to various project dynamics, driving successful outcomes in complex environments while prioritizing operational management. I have experience leading diverse teams in the development of compliance-focused platforms, ensuring alignment with industry standards.
